hero.title: Transform Your Data Into
hero.description: Riqo helps businesses unlock the power of their data through expert visualization, interactive dashboards, and compelling data storytelling that drives decisions.
hero.visualInsightsDesc: Transform complex data into clear, actionable visual insights
hero.interactiveDashboardsDesc: Real-time dashboards that update automatically with your data
hero.dataStorytellingDesc: Craft compelling narratives that make your data memorable

services.title: Our Services
services.description: From data integration to storytelling, we provide end-to-end solutions that transform your data into actionable business intelligence.
services.dataIntegrationDesc: Connect and consolidate data from multiple sources into unified, clean datasets ready for analysis.
services.customDashboardsDesc: Build interactive, real-time dashboards tailored to your business needs and KPIs.
services.dataVisualizationDesc: Create compelling charts, graphs, and visual representations that make complex data accessible.
services.performanceAnalyticsDesc: Monitor and analyze business performance with automated reporting and alerting systems.
services.dataStorytellingServiceDesc: Transform raw data into compelling narratives that drive business decisions and engagement.
services.realtimeProcessingDesc: Process and visualize streaming data in real-time for immediate insights and actions.

pricing.title: Transparent, Two-Phase Pricing
pricing.description: First, we build your custom data visualization solution. Then, choose a monthly plan for ongoing updates and maintenance.
pricing.phase1PriceDesc: Price varies based on client needs and objectives, according to what they want to achieve
pricing.phase2Description: After your initial setup, choose a monthly plan for data updates, reports, and ongoing support.
pricing.basicDesc: Includes all free features from Supabase and Grafana accounts
pricing.businessDesc: Contact if you need more dashboards or space - includes professional team support
pricing.readyToStartDesc: Let's discuss your project requirements and create a custom solution that fits your needs perfectly.

features.dataStorage500MB: Up to 500 MB of data simultaneously
features.minorUpdates: Includes minor dashboards or datasource updates from a riqo team member
features.newDashboards5: Up to 5 new dashboards each month
features.contactForMore: Contact if you need more dashboards or space

about.title: About Riqo
about.description1: Riqo, derived from the Quechua word "riquy" meaning "to see," embodies our mission to help businesses truly see and understand their data. We believe that every dataset tells a story, and our expertise lies in uncovering and presenting these stories in ways that drive meaningful action.
about.description2: Our team of data visualization experts, analysts, and storytellers work together to transform complex data into clear, actionable insights. We combine technical expertise with creative design to deliver solutions that not only inform but inspire.
about.missionDesc: To democratize data insights by making complex information accessible, understandable, and actionable for businesses of all sizes.
about.testimonial1Quote: Riqo transformed our data chaos into clear, actionable insights. Their dashboards helped us identify key trends that increased our revenue by 30%.
about.testimonial2Quote: The team at Riqo didn't just build dashboards - they helped us understand our data story. The visualizations are intuitive and powerful.

clients.title: Trusted by Leading Organizations
clients.description: Join the growing number of companies that trust Riqo to transform their data into actionable insights.
clients.readyToJoin: Ready to join our growing list of satisfied clients?

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Ready to transform your data? Let's discuss how Riqo can help you unlock the power of your information.
contact.conversationDesc: Whether you're looking to create your first dashboard or need a complete data transformation, our team is here to help you succeed.
contact.formDesc: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.name: Name

footer.description: Riqo transforms complex data into compelling visual stories that drive business decisions. From the Quechua word meaning "to see," we help you truly see your data.
footer.allRightsReserved: Â© 2025 Riqo Agency. All rights reserved.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Upload your CSV files and manage your data visualizations
dashboard.uploadDesc: Upload your CSV file to update your dashboards and visualizations
dashboard.noDashboards: No dashboards yet. Upload a CSV file to get started!
dashboard.gettingStartedDesc: Follow these steps to start visualizing your data
dashboard.step1Desc: Upload a CSV file containing your data. Make sure it has proper headers.
dashboard.step2Desc: We'll process your data and validate the format for optimal visualization.
dashboard.step3Desc: Access your updated dashboards and visualizations in real-time.
dashboard.clientDatabaseNotConfigured: Client database not configured. Please contact support to set up your data visualization environment.
dashboard.uploadTakingLonger: Upload is taking longer than expected. Please check back later.
